016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapischema;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.builders.With;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.HyperSchema;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Link;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.Links;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.JsonSchema;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Properties;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonschema.Types;
025
026import java.util.function.Consumer;
027
028public record ResourceObjectSchema(HyperSchema schema) {
029
030    public record Builder(HyperSchema.Builder builder,
031                          Properties.Builder properties,
032                          Properties.Builder attributes,
033                          Properties.Builder relationships,
034                          Links.Builder links)
035            implements With<Builder> {
036        public Builder() {
037            this(new HyperSchema.Builder(new JsonSchema.Builder()),
038                    new Properties.Builder(),
039                    new Properties.Builder(),
040                    new Properties.Builder(),
041                    new Links.Builder()
042            );
043        }
044
045        public Builder type(Enum<?> value) {
046            properties.property("type", new JsonSchema.Builder()
047                            .type(Types.String)
048                            .constant(builder.builder().builder().textNode(value.name()))
049                            .build())
050                    .property("id", new JsonSchema.Builder()
051                            .type(Types.String)
052                            .build());
053            return this;
054        }
055
056        public Builder attributes(Consumer<Properties.Builder> with) {
057            with.accept(attributes);
058            return this;
059        }
060
061        public Builder relationships(Consumer<Properties.Builder> with) {
062            with.accept(relationships);
063            return this;
064        }
065
066        public Builder link(String rel) {
067            links.link(new Link.Builder()
068                    .rel(rel)
069                    .href("{+link_href}")
070                    .templateRequired("link_href")
071                    .templatePointer("link_href", "0/data/links/" + rel)
072                    .build());
073
074            return this;
075        }
076
077
078        public ResourceObjectSchema build() {
079            builder()
080                    .links(links.build())
081                    .builder()
082                    .properties(properties
083                            .property("relationships", new JsonSchema.Builder()
084                                    .type(Types.Object)
085                                    .additionalProperties(false)
086                                    .properties(relationships.build())
087                                    .build())
088                            .property("attributes", new JsonSchema.Builder()
089                                    .type(Types.Object)
090                                    .additionalProperties(false)
091                                    .properties(attributes.build())
092                                    .build())
093                            .build());
094            return new ResourceObjectSchema(builder.build());
095        }
096    }
097}
